song_lyrics: Dhanya chhe dhīraj dhāre tene, banī shake bebhān jone;
Pānḍav jyāre van parvariyā, dukhne dīdhā mān jone... 1
Harishchandrarāyne Harivar sāthe, lagnī kevī lāgī jone;
Antya varaṇne gher vechāṇā, to bhavnī bhāvaṭ bhāngī jone... 2
Prah‍lādjīne pīḍā bahu vidh, daityapatie dīdhī jone;
Sukhḍā jevī sahan karī to, Keshav rakṣhā kīdhī jone... 3
Shaher maḷyu nahi Sudāmāne, to paṇ ānand tevo jone;
Moḷī bhājī Vidūrjīnī, sūtar jevī sevo jone... 4
Mayūrdhvaj rāye mastak upar, karvat līdhu koḍe jone;
Sagāḷshāe sut vadheryo, tyāgī dīdhā hoḍ jone... 5
Rantidevnā hṛudayā madhye, jaraṇā kero jog jone;
Mādhavdāse māgī līdho, rājī thaīne rog jone... 6
Dukhne dekhī harijan na ḍare, kare fikarnā fānkā jone;
Devānand kahe dev bharose, kāḷ taṇā e kākā jone... 7
title: Dhanya chhe dhīraj dhāre tene

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-421: Sadguru Devanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
